item.title: Leetcode 1954
item.description: 1954. Minimum Garden Perimeter to Collect Enough Apples For this solution, I will try to explain it with an image. I have drawn a picture to explain how this solution works. I have drawn a 2 x 2 and a 4 x 4 square. I will explain the reason for this later. And I have given each position a letter instead of coordinate so I can give a map with each letter and coordinate.
